package.name: motoman_gp4_support

description.p: ROS-Industrial support for the Motoman GP4 (and variants).
This package contains configuration data, 3D models and launch files for Motoman GP4 manipulators. This currently includes the base model which also supports the DT and XP variants.
Joint limits and maximum joint velocities are based on the information found in YASKAWA MOTOMAN-GP4 INSTRUCTIONS (HW2480085) version 192633-1CD, rev 1.
All urdfs are based on the default motion and joint velocity limits, unless noted otherwise.
Before using any of the configuration files and / or meshes included in this package, be sure to check they are correct for the particular robot model and configuration you intend to use them with.

package.author: Eric Marcil
package.maintainer: G.A. vd. Hoorn (TU Delft Robotics Institute)
